TLCConcept.showAs: The Environmental Protection (Single-use Vapes) (Amendment) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 2025

formula.name: enactingText
formula.p:
The Department of Agriculture, Environment and Rural Affairs, in exercise of the powers conferred by Article 32(1), (2)(a) and (c) and (6) of the Waste and Contaminated Land (Northern Ireland) Order 1997
S.I. 1997/2778 (N.I. 19), makes the following Regulations.

In accordance with Article 32(3) of that Order, the Department has published a notice indicating the effect of these Regulations and has taken into consideration the representations made to it in accordance with the notice.

content.p: These Regulations may be cited as the Environmental Protection (Single-use Vapes) (Amendment) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 2025 and come into operation in 29th July 2025.

article.heading: Amendment of the Environmental Protection (Single-use Vapes) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 2024

content.p:
The Environmental Protection (Single-use Vapes) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 2024
S.R. 2024 No. 212 are amended in accordance with regulations 3 to 5.
